title: Sony Linkbuds Review: Fulfilling my dream of ambient audio, and doing it better than Pixel Buds
content:
Truly wireless earbuds have a variety of use cases, but their small and portable form factor have, for me, always been a great fit for ambient audio. That’s a purpose that most brands have basically ignored, short of Google’s Pixel Buds. The new Sony LinkBuds go all-in on mixing your music with the surrounding world, and I’ve been waiting years for these to exist.

more…

The post Sony Linkbuds Review: Fulfilling my dream of ambient audio, and doing it better than Pixel Buds appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Sony LinkBuds take an entirely different approach to truly wireless earbuds, and in turn create an epic ambient audio companion.
